column5: - Bath Towel, Shampoo, & Body Wash Provided - Open Kitchen - Fridge Storage  - Free Washer/Dryer - Parking - Park close by and 24hr fitness (2 miles)  - Safe, Quiet N - Entertainment Center available - Internet provided  My place is close to nightlife, public transport, the city center  Located with 5 miles from the shops of the legacy, The Dallas Star, Stonebriar mall.   Quiet, clean and very homey describes my place. I like my guests to feel at home and comfortable.
column8: Comfy 3b w/your own bathroom. Great location too!
